|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI M2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Pro |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AL6KBL-M8821CU1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905X3; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |gpu1chip1 = Mali;-G31 MP2; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = ARM |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = 650 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC 5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Rayson;RS512M32LZ4; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01-00049;-gfe343ff-dirty; |stockos = Linux;4.9.241;Debian 10;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 3.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.1, Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.2, IR receiver, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = Super Speed USB 3.1 Gen1 Hub Controller;VIA Labs;VL817;;1;,,, 4Mbit Serial Multi I/O Flash;Puya Semiconductor;P25Q40H;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;3;,,, 18V, 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy;SY8120B;;4;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, Ultra Low Dropout 500mA CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;1;,,, 300mA Low Dropout RF Linear Regulator;SGMicro;SGM2032;;5;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0544T;;4;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;SGMicro;SGM803;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = bananapi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 9, CoreELEC, Armbian, Volumio, Arch Linux (Arm)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/07/2020 |estreldate = 05/2021 |estprice = 61 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAU2EGZS8341 |asin = B095HC26R4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = LB-LINK BL-M8821CU1 |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8821CU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905X3 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G31 @650MHz (OpenGL 2.0/ES 3.2) :VPU (with 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16GB eMMC 5.1 Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC Card slot *Memory: 2GB (DDR4) RAM *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8821CU :Dual-band 802.11abgn+ac 2.4/5GHz, Bluetooth 4.2 *Network: 1x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M2_Pro ''Banana Pi BPI-M2 Pro'' on '''BPi''' Wiki]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/05/28/banana-pi-bpi-m2-pro-is-a-compact-amlogic-s905x3-sbc/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M2 Pro compact Amlogic S905X3 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/banana-pi-with-quad-a55-amlogic-s905x3-launches-at-61/ ''Banana Pi with quad -A55 Amlogic S905X3 launches'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
